snippet: The Oglala Sioux Tribe of South Dakota sued several large beer makers on Thursday, saying they knowingly contributed to devastating alcohol-related problems on the Pine Ridge Indian Reservation.
abstract: Oglala Sioux Tribe of South Dakota sues several large beer makers, saying they knowingly contributed to devastating alcohol-related problems on the Pine Ridge Indian Reservation.
lead_paragraph: The Oglala Sioux Tribe of South Dakota sued several large beer makers on Thursday, saying they knowingly contributed to devastating alcohol-related problems on the Pine Ridge Indian Reservation.

headline.seo: South Dakota: Oglala Sioux Tribe Sues Beer Makers
headline.main: South Dakota: Oglala Sioux Tribe Sues Beer Makers
